ComicInfo.Summary: On the Death of a Friend [Part 1]: The Enterprise answers a distress call from Proxima Centauri, where the find the populace of the planet the victims of a widespread plague. As Kirk, Spock, and McCoy beam down to the planet to investigate, Chekov discovers evidence of familiar readings that may be the source of the plague.
ComicInfo.Tags: Nyota Uhura,James T. Kirk,Starfleet,Montgomery Scott,Hikaru Sulu,Arex,Enterprise Crew,Alpha Centauri,Isis,Spock,Leonard McCoy,Pavel Chekov
ComicInfo.Title: On the Death of a Friend [Part 1]
